alert.note: Alert for Beaverhead and Western Madison below 6000ft; Gallatin Valley; Gallatin and Madison County Mountains and Centennial Mountains; Madison River Valley (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 23 at 10:39AM MST until December 23 at 8:00PM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM MST THIS EVENING... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY WILL EXPIRE AT 11 AM MST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations up to two inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...The Madison and Beaverhead River Valleys, Gallatin Valley, and Gallatin and Madison County Mountains and Centennial Mountains. * WHEN...Until 8 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the Friday evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website. Be prepared for slippery roads. Slow down and use caution while driving. If you are going outside, watch your first few steps taken on stairs, sidewalks, and driveways. These surfaces could be icy and slippery, increasing your risk of a fall and injury.

area.areaDesc: Beaverhead and Western Madison below 6000ft; Gallatin Valley; Gallatin and Madison County Mountains and Centennial Mountains; Madison River Valley
